thread.title: Pictures: Newsies @ The Bushnell
thread.title_full: Pictures: Newsies @ The Bushnell - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: Pictures: Newsies @ The Bushnell
text:
Caption Newsies @ The Bushnell Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant Newsies @ The Bushnell Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant See more galleries Another round of Newsies fans got a chance to look like a Newsie at the Bushnell Center for the Performing Arts on Saturday. While waiting for the show to begin, guests had a chance to stand in a picture window for an 1800s Courant Newspaper and get a photo taken.
Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant
